original_title: WWE: Tombstone - The History of the Undertaker
overview: Since his eerie debut at the 1990 Survivor Series, the Undertaker has gone on to take the WWE championship four times and become one of the most popular--and feared--superstars in the history of the squared circle. This three-disc set traces the in-ring evolution of the wrestler known as the Phenom, the American Badass and the Deadman through 21 of his greatest bouts, with bonus footage, rare interviews and more. 10 hrs
title: WWE: Tombstone - The History of the Undertaker
